script:module:

REM ***** BASIC ***** option explicit
Sub Test_Last Dim sTableName as String,oRecord1 as Object Dim sSQL1 as String,sSQL2 as String
sSQL1="use aladin" SQL_execute_mysql(sSQL1) sSQL2="show tables" oRecord1=oResult_Scroll_mysql(sSQL2)
'GlobalScope.BasicLibraries.LoadLibrary("Tools") 'WriteDbgInfo(oRecord1)
oRecord1.first oRecord1.last 'oRecord1.AFTERLast 'oRecord1.previous
sTableName=oRecord1.getString(1) print sTableName End Sub
Sub SQL_DB_kopieren GlobalScope.BasicLibraries.LoadLibrary("ALADIN") Dim sTableName as String,oRecord1 as Object Dim sSQL1 as String,sSQL2 as String,sSQL3 as String,sSQL4 as String,sSQL5 as String Dim iCountTable as Integer Use_Aladin
sSQL4="delete from Einstellungen" SQL_execute_mysql(sSQL4) sSQL5="delete from Controlling where PositionsID=1" SQL_execute_mysql(sSQL5)
sSQL1="use aladin_old" SQL_execute_mysql(sSQL1) sSQL2="show tables" oRecord1=oResult_Scroll_mysql(sSQL2)
oRecord1.AFTERLast oRecord1.previous
iCountTable=oRecord1.getRow sTableName=oRecord1.getString(1)
For iCount=1 to iCountTable oRecord1=oResult_Scroll_mysql(sSQL2) oRecord1.absolute(iCount) sTableName=oRecord1.getString(1) 'print sTableName
if sTableName="Steuerung" or sTableName="Einheit" or sTableName="Leerzeilen" _ or sTableName="Document_Typ" or Right(sTableName,4)= "TEMP" or Left(Right(sTableName,5),4)= "TEMP" _ or Left(Right(sTableName,6),4)= "TEMP" _ or sTableName="Start" or sTableName="Status" or sTableName="Monate" or sTableName="Pos_Typ" then wait 1 else sSQL3="insert into aladin."& sTableName &" select * from aladin_old."& sTableName SQL_execute_mysql(sSQL3) wait 10 End if
Next iCount End Sub
Sub SQL_DB_kopieren_old Dim sTableName as String For iCount = 1 to 17 if iCount = 1 then sTableName= "Adressen" elseif iCount = 2 then sTableName= "Angebote1" elseif iCount = 3 then sTableName= "Angebote2" elseif iCount = 4 then sTableName= "Ansprechpartner_Kunden" elseif iCount = 5 then sTableName= "Hauptgruppen" elseif iCount = 6 then sTableName= "Kunden" elseif iCount = 7 then sTableName= "Leistungsgruppen" elseif iCount = 8 then sTableName= "Leistungsstamm" elseif iCount = 9 then sTableName= "Lieferanten" elseif iCount = 10 then sTableName= "ZwiBemAngebote" elseif iCount = 11 then sTableName= "ZwiSuAngebote" elseif iCount = 12 then sTableName= "Rechnungen1" elseif iCount = 13 then sTableName= "Rechnungen2" elseif iCount = 14 then sTableName= "ZwiBemRechnungen" elseif iCount = 15 then sTableName= "ZwiSuRechnungen" elseif iCount = 16 then sTableName= "Ansprechpartner_Lieferanten" elseif iCount = 17 then sTableName= "Eingangsrechnungen" End if sSQL="insert into aladin."& sTableName &" select * from aladin_old."& sTableName SQL_execute_mysql(sSQL) Next iCount End Sub
